participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Friendly and caring, George is someone who loves to share stories from his past. He enjoys helping others and values community.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and easy-going, Samantha has a passion for music and enjoys connecting with people. She has a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i am a convenience store manager. i met taylor swift. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair.
